document.full_text: greek debt could undergo a "soft" restructuring if athens embarks on major reforms and accelerates privatization to raise funds, the chairman of euro zone finance ministers jean-claude juncker said on tuesday.
document.title: eu's juncker weighs "soft" greek debt restructuring
lines_and_colors: greek debt could undergo a "soft" restructuring if athens embarks on major reforms and accelerates privatization to raise funds, the chairman of euro zone finance ministers jean-claude juncker said on tuesday.
